title: raamaa sIthArAma raamaaa raajaa
sahitya:
rAma sItArAma rAma rAja tanaya rAma dasharatha rAma sItArAma rAma raghu kulAbhi sOma

caraNam 1

 uragamulu penagi naTlunnadi nA manasu karuNa jEsi kanTa jUci karamu baTTu rAma
   
caraNam 2

 satsati patisEva sEyu candana nA manasu utsavamulu sEyuTa kuppongini rAma
   
caraNam 3

 kalpa bhujmuna tIga kaTTu rIti manasu kalpamu lennaina viDici kadaladu shrI rAma
   
caraNam 4

 advaita sAmrAjyamu labbinaTTu rAma sad-vairAgyamu nidiyu sAyujyamE rAma
   
caraNam 5

 Agama nigamAmulaku arthamidi rAma tyAgarAjAjucE jEyinci bhOgamondu rAma
